Package battle

Class Arena

  • java.lang.Object
    • battle.Arena
  • public class Arena
extends java.lang.Object
    This the class which keeps the list of the gear and the weapon. The player can request the list of gear and the weapon from the arena class. It includes method like getListOfGear which selects twenty random gear from the available list of gears and getWeapon which selects one gear form the available list of weapons

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Arena​(ValueGenerator randomNumber)
      This method constructs the object of the Arena class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected java.util.List<Gear> getListOfGear()
      This method specifies the list of the gear the which has to be assigned to the player.
      protected java.util.List<Weapon> getWeapon()
      This method specifies the object of the weapon class which we have to assigned to the player on appropriate call to this method.
